forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 32F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 31F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 38F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low -2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 28F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with a light wintry mix in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow showers developing in the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light freezing rain. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of wintry precipation will become lighter and intermittent late. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix in the morning will transition to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of light winter precipitation in the morning. Then snow showers, mixing with rain at times, in the afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulations around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of light rain and freezing rain. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain and freezing rain. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.
